releaseNotes:
**The Forest Awakens: A Complete Remastering of a Beloved Classic**

After years of enchanting families worldwide, Peekaboo Forest emerges transformed—completely rebuilt from the ground up while preserving every magical moment that has made Charley Harper's woodland masterpiece a cornerstone of early childhood digital experiences. This isn't merely an update; it's a comprehensive renaissance that future-proofs this cherished educational treasure for generations to come.

**Preserving Charley Harper's Timeless Vision**
Every geometric line, every vibrant hue, every carefully crafted creature remains exactly as the legendary illustrator intended. Harper's mid-century modern wildlife artistry has influenced countless designers and artists, yet his original forest scenes retain their unique power to captivate developing minds. This complete reconstruction ensures his artistic legacy will continue inspiring wonder and nature appreciation for decades ahead, with cutting-edge technology supporting his timeless vision.

**Technical Revolution, Artistic Preservation**
Behind the scenes, Peekaboo Forest has undergone a complete technological transformation using state-of-the-art development frameworks designed for longevity and reliability. While the beloved seasonal forest exploration remains unchanged—the same delightful animal discoveries, the same real woodland sounds, the same gentle cause-and-effect interactions—the underlying architecture now ensures seamless performance across current and future devices.

**Unwavering Commitment to Childhood Privacy**
In an era where digital privacy has become increasingly precious, this rebuilt version reinforces our founding principles with even stronger protections. Zero data collection, complete offline functionality, and absolutely no advertising remain our sacred commitments. We've never wavered from these values, and this comprehensive rebuild ensures they'll endure indefinitely. No tracking algorithms studying your child's behavior, no corporate partnerships compromising play experiences, no subscription traps or manipulation tactics—just pure educational exploration honoring childhood as it should be.

**The Independent Studio Difference**
Created by our small, passionate team at Peekaboo Interactive Games, every line of code reflects our dedication to meaningful children's technology. Unlike corporate app factories churning out derivative content, we pour heart and expertise into each creation. Our backgrounds in cognitive science, child development, and educational media shine through every interaction, ensuring Peekaboo Forest remains a genuine learning tool rather than mere entertainment.

**Future-Proofed for Tomorrow's Learners**
This complete rebuild positions Peekaboo Forest to serve educational communities for years ahead. The same beloved woodland discovery that has supported countless therapy sessions and classroom activities now runs on modern infrastructure designed for institutional reliability and longevity.

**A Living Legacy**
Charley Harper's forest doesn't just display animals—it cultivates environmental stewardship and nature appreciation in developing minds. This rebuilt version ensures his conservation message will continue reaching new generations of young nature lovers, supporting environmental education initiatives worldwide.
description:
Explore beautiful forest scenes and discover marvelous creatures with classic art by Charley Harper.

Touch the vividly illustrated forest scenes to see charming animations, learn the names of animals, and hear the real sounds these creatures make in the wild. Search for deer, squirrels, weasels and more as the seasons change. 

• Choose your narration: a child narrator in English, an adult narrator in English or Spanish
• Record your own voice. Or grandma’s! Hear your special audio play in the app
• Ideal for the youngest app users
• Sound design and art by renown illustrator Charley Harper
• Play anywhere: no internet necessary
• Totally safe: no third-party advertising or in-app purchases. No pop-ups interrupting play.

“It's a great way to teach toddlers the words for different creatures and the sounds they make.” - MSNBC

“Constructed around the passing of seasons, the narrative features animals emerging from the bush and hiding in the dark of night, delighting toddlers with its roster of real animal sounds and interactive technology.” - Coolhunting.com

WHO MADE THIS?
Peekaboo Forest was handmade with love by humans at Peekaboo Interactive Games (formerly Night & Day Studios), specially crafted by expert app designers for early childhood learners and children of all ages with special needs. 


PRIVACY POLICY
We care about your privacy and the privacy of your children. We comply with COPPA, the Children’s Online Privacy Protection Act, to protect the information of your children (and ours!) online. For our full privacy policy,  see https://peekabookinteractive.com/privacy

QUESTIONS OR CONCERNS?
Please contact us at support@peekaboointeractive.com before posting a review. We appreciate the opportunity to troubleshoot for you!

THANKS TO OUR FANS!
If your child loves Peekaboo Forest, please do us the honor of rating and reviewing the app on the App Store. Each review is meaningful to our small team.
